info.title: FAB Client Lib
info.description: Python client lib to access Flatland Association Benchmarks / AI4REALNET Campaign Hub Backend API, generated with openapi-generator

get.description: Get submission results aggregated by test.

400.description: Some results could not be inserted, transaction aborted.

get.description: Get submission results for specific scenario.
Returns campaign-item overviews (i.e. all tests in benchmark with score of top submission per test).

scorings.description: Dictionary of test scores (best submission only).

get.description: Returns campaign overviews (i.e. all benchmarks in the group with score aggregated from their top submission per test).

scorings.description: Dictionary of test scores (best submission only).

benchmark_id.description: ID of benchmark this submission belongs to.

parameters.name: submitted_by
parameters.description: Filter submissions by user. If this equals the authenticated user, un-published submissions will be listed too.
